newsitem.title: USA: Air-Cure to buy Ohmstede Inc.
newsitem.headline: Air-Cure to buy Ohmstede Inc.

text.p: Air-Cure Technologies Inc said on Thursday it signed a letter of intent to buy Ohmstede Inc, a 91-year-old, privately held firm that specializes in the design, manufacture and repair of heat exchangers.
Air-Cure said the acquisition should contribute over $100 million in annual revenues and is projected to be highly accretive to Air-Cure's earnings.

The negotiated purchase price for Ohmstede is about $50 million which is expected to be financed by the combination of a private placement and proceeds from Air-Cure's bank credit facilities, a statement from Air-Cure said.
Air-Cure's Chief Financial Officer Larry McAfee said the addition of Ohmstede is expected to double Air-Cure's revenue base to over $200 million annually.
